name: Jackett Inc.
description: Developer of an ed-tech platform designed to empower teachers with the next generation of innovative tools. The company's platform provides a personalized question bank that allows one to store and search for assessment questions feasibly, enabling teachers to create assessments from scratch by simply taking a photo, uploading a photo, or even a PDF to digitize questions in seconds.
one_liner: Developer of an ed-tech platform designed to empower teachers with the next generation of innovative tools. The company's platform provides a personalized question bank that allows one to store and search for assessment questions feasibly, enabling teachers to create assessments from scratch by simply taking a photo, uploading a photo, or even a PDF to digitize questions in seconds.
